errors.cause: LLM provider for feedback functions not set up

solutions.code:
from trulens_eval import OpenAI
import os
os.environ['OPENAI_API_KEY'] = 'your-key'
provider = OpenAI()

from trulens_eval import Huggingface
provider = Huggingface()

from trulens_eval import TruChain
tru_recorder = TruChain(
    chain,
    app_id='my-app',
    feedbacks=[f_relevance, f_groundedness]
)
with tru_recorder as recording:
    response = chain.invoke(query)

from trulens_eval import TruLlama
tru_recorder = TruLlama(
    query_engine,
    app_id='my-app',
    feedbacks=[f_relevance]
)

from trulens_eval import TruCustomApp
tru_recorder = TruCustomApp(
    app_id='my-app',
    feedbacks=[f_relevance]
)

from trulens_eval import Feedback
from trulens_eval.feedback import Groundedness

grounded = Groundedness(groundedness_provider=provider)
f_groundedness = Feedback(
    grounded.groundedness_measure_with_cot_reasons
).on(
    TruLlama.select_source_nodes().node.text
).on_output()

from trulens_eval import Tru
tru = Tru()  # Uses default SQLite
tru.reset_database()  # Clear if needed

# For LangChain
from trulens_eval.schema import Select
f = Feedback(provider.relevance).on(
    Select.RecordInput[:].page_content  # Source docs
).on_output()

from trulens_eval import Tru
tru = Tru()
tru.run_dashboard()  # Opens Streamlit dashboard

# Skip dashboard, access data directly
records = tru.get_records_and_feedback(app_ids=['my-app'])
print(records)

with tru_recorder as recording:
    response = chain.invoke(query)
# Get record with feedback
record = recording.get()
# Wait for all feedback
for feedback, result in record.wait_for_feedback_results().items():
    print(f'{feedback.name}: {result.result}')

tru_recorder = TruChain(
    chain,
    feedbacks=[f_relevance],
    feedback_mode='immediate'  # Not deferred
)
